Name: ActivistShorts
Text: RT @KerrisdaleCap: Tmrw, we write on a $1b+ biotech short owned by a famously bad bio investor, previously written on by another shortselle…

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: $CVNA misses consensus by ~10% as our data suggested. Worse, our data suggests they have again guided VERY aggressively for Q4. Why? (1/n)

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Perhaps it is because $CVNA just burned another $70M of cash and has less than 2 quarters of cash on the b/s (2/n)

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Worse than a structurally broken biz model, $CVNA showing its true colors by removing important disclosures (3/n)

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: We exposed $CVNA dropping delivery costs to SG&A (GPU shenanigans),& now they hide SG&A component disclosure (8/8 8K=pg 13, 8K today = gone)

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: Further, $CVNA has now removed the disclosure of its inventory from the shareholder letter and 8K as well.

Name: CopperfieldRscr
Text: $CVNA miss Q3, guidedown Q4, will miss again based on current trends, needs capital to plug cash burn, and no longer disclosing key metrics
